main.name: Johannes Chitura
main.description: I am currently transitioning from the education sector to software engineering and concurrently working on some side projects. I am pasionate about writing clear and logical code hence the name, Cogent Code
main.bio: Most of the issues faced by African countries will be resolved by utilizing technology. Software Engineers will be central in this process. This realization and the desire to take part in a personal rebirth to mirror the renascence of Africa, prompted me to pursue a career in Software Engineering. I am privileged to hold executive leadership positions in the education sector as well as to have experience as a licensed commercial pilot. My approach as a developer is heavily influenced by my skills gained as a leader and pilot as well as my unique perspective as a third-culture individual. I approach each story in the Agile Methodology with the end user in mind. My go-to technology is the MERN stack, though I am by no means limited to these technologies. I am a lifelong learner and I find joy in learning new paths to solutions.

Helped iterate the topics to make sure everyone understood material , an felt comfortable. As a busy father and student. Never once did I ever get the sense I was ever a bother or interruption if i need to ask for help,. He always made time to schedule a meet up , no mater how busy the day got. 100% reliable.
